content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
• No new permanent structures have been successfully built. The agent made repeated attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs to research, but none of these attempts completed successfully due to inventory shortages and missing ingredients. 

• In support of resource processing, the agent made use of existing smelting facilities:
  – Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
   Used to convert iron ore and coal into additional iron plates.
  – Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
   Used to smelt copper ore (with coal) into copper plates for later copper cable production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Usage Errors
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. "radius") or extra positional arguments to get_entities(). Verify the function’s signature to ensure proper parameter usage.

• Lab Placement and Iteration Issues
  – Before attempting placement, confirm that the required Lab is present in inventory.
  – When filtering lists of retrieved entities (such as labs), ensure the returned value is a valid iterable (for example, use an empty list as fallback rather than None).

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages
  – Check that all sub-ingredients for lab crafting (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables) are sufficiently available before initiating the recipe.
  – Ensure that supporting production (such as smelting and crafting of intermediary items) is aligned with the resource requirements of the lab recipe.

NAMESPACE
─────────
(No agent-defined functions to report.)
